channel.title: Projects on Stack Overflow Survey Results
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Stack Overflow Survey Results

item.title: A Glimps at Recent Technology Trends in Coding World
item.description: Objectives The intention of this post is to provide answers to the following questions: What type of developers are among the top trends of recents years? How has it been varying year by year since 2017? Which programming languages have been the most popular according to last 4 years’ survey? What are the popular programming languages for Linux, Mac and Windows operating system users in 2020?
